meanings.sent1: The porphyritic rock had speckles of different colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a porphyritic landscape with vibrant hues.
meanings.sent3: The porphyritic pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: Her dress shimmered like a porphyritic gem under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The porphyritic texture of the cake added a unique crunchiness.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of porphyry.
meanings.sent1: The porphyritic columns in the building were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed ancient artifacts made of porphyritic stone.
meanings.sent3: The porphyritic decorations in the garden gave it a regal touch.
meanings.sent4: His speech had a porphyritic tone that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The porphyritic architecture of the castle was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Having large crystals embedded in a fine-grained matrix.
meanings.sent1: The porphyritic granite sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a vein of porphyritic ore deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The porphyritic structure of the cake made it look like a treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes gleamed like porphyritic jewels in the dim room.
meanings.sent5: The porphyritic texture of the soil indicated its mineral richness.
